Even if I wasn't helping either one of them,\nthere wouldn't be any problems with me\nwatching Shuri and Kagura practice.%K%P
I thought to myself as I made my way\nto the usual practice spot.%K%P
'Here you go. I got these for you just in case.'%K%P
She handed me a headband and some glow sticks.%K%P
'What's all this?'%K%P
'Some fan merch.\nFor camouflage.'%K%P
'Sorry, I have no idea what you're talking about.'%K%P
'Well, all my fans have found my practice spot.\nIf you show up here acting like you own the place,\nthere'll be trouble.'%K%P

'So, you're going to have to watch from a distance,
just like any other fan.
If you get too close, or try to talk to me,
I'll get angry.'%K%P
She forced the merchandise on me\nthen rushed off to practice.%K%P
As a Divine Idol who'd made\nit through the preliminaries,\nShuri was getting a lot of attention.%K%P
Fans were starting to gather to watch her practice.%K%P
She was right, of course. If I started talking\nto her like I was someone special, I could cause\nsome serious problems for her.%K%P
'So I guess this means I'm out of the picture.'%K%P
I set down the fan goods and left.%K%P
The Goddess Cafe Amano Kaguyama was full today, too.%K%P
Word had spread that one of the staff here\nhad made it through the qualifying round.%K%P
'Kagura!'%K%P
'Yes, yes, here I am!'%K%P
Kagura was busier than ever.%K%P

The other goddesses were rushing around
taking care of customers, too.
The area in front of the shop was crowded
with people lining up to get in.%K%P
'I'm sorry, Yamato!\nI can't stop to chat, but have a seat\nand relax, okay?'%K%P
Until the finals were over, I would only be\na bother to both of them.%K%P
'Well, what am I supposed to do now?'%K%P
I had been giving all of my free time to Love☆Kami,\nand now I was suddenly left to my own devices.%K%P
'I'm so booored.'%K%P
What did I used to do before I met those two?%K%P
It wasn't that long ago, but I couldn't remember.%K%P
'Hellooo... Oh, uh, knock-knock.'%K%P
Sara came in, then thought twice\nand knocked on the door behind her.%K%P
'Sara... If you're going to knock, try to do it\nbefore you come in.'%K%P
You don't even need to say 'knock-knock'.%K%P
'Sorry, am I interrupting something?'%K%P
'No, not at all.\nBut what about you, aren't you busy right now?'%K%P
I pointed at my PC screen.%K%P
I had just been reading an article\nabout how busy she was with\nher retirement preparations.%K%P
'Yeah, it doesn't look like it's they're going to\nlet me quit so easily.\nThere are a lot of loose ends to tie up.'%K%P
The Divine Idol world was not so simple that\none could simply just quit because they wanted to.%K%P
It couldn't be helped since she couldn't sing,\nbut apparently they were having her do\na lot of other things instead.%K%P
'That's why I came, to get a bit of peace.'%K%P
'Phew... I really like it here, it calms me down.'%K%P
She'd decided to borrow my bed.%K%P
But I guessed I wouldn't make an issue of it,\nit looked like she needed some peace and quiet.%K%P
'You don't want to be around\nthe other members of L☆SEVEN?'%K%P
'Well, right now it's a little awkward.'%K%P

Sara's sudden announcement had thrown
L☆SEVEN into chaos.
Even if they all accepted it,
it wouldn't exactly be comfortable for everyone.%K%P
'So is it okay if I just hang out here for a while?'%K%P
'It's fine with me, if you don't mind the place.'%K%P
'Mmmm... Yamato, you're so sweet!\nCome on, let big sis give you a squeeze.'%K%P
'Quit messing around.\nI am a guy, you know.'%K%P
'Sorry, sorry, I guess I tease you a bit too much.'%K%P
'Try to have a little more self-awareness, okay?'%K%P
I just blurted it out, and then immediately realized\nwhat I'd said.%K%P
'What do you mean... Self-awareness? In what way?'%K%P
It was a bit much to demand that she keep\nthinking of herself as an idol, since she was\nquitting after all.%K%P
'You should remember you're a girl.'%K%P
'Remember I'm a girl...\nHeehee, you got me there.'%K%P
'You're right, I'm a goddess, and I'm an idol,\nbut I'm also a girl.\nSo I should behave myself in front of a boy, right?'%K%P
'Something like that.\nI'll be counting on you.'%K%P
Sara straightened up after my advice.%K%P
For some reason, she stared at me\nwith a little grin on her face.%K%P
'Wh-What's wrong, why are you staring like that?'%K%P
'I was just thinking...\nI had forgotten that you're a boy...'%K%P
'Well, I don't think I look like\na girl or anything...'%K%P
'I know, I know.\nDon't worry, you're every bit a boy.'%K%P
I had no idea what she was getting at.%K%P
It made me uncomfortable to be stared at like that,\nbut Sara seemed happy, so I let it go.%K%P
